forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
